0.description: Scheduled - Trigger for playbooks to run on a specific schedule.

cron.description: Specify a schedule using the UNIX cron format to trigger the playbook (the playbook won't run until the cron triggers for the first time).

interval_in_min.description: If Schedule is not specified, choose an interval in minutes to trigger the playbook periodically, starting immediately. Use -1 as a special value to trigger the playbook only once. It will trigger again every time the playbook is updated.

0.name: Scheduled

7.description: Iterate over items in a given list variable

list.description: Select a variable that contains a list of items

7.name: For Each Item In List

parameters.description: Specify input parameters that will be available within the script.

script.description: Write some custom logic using JavaScript.

11.description: Make a call to a REST API

ignore_errors.description: If Yes, this node will succeed regardless of the API response

integration_id.description: Pick a satellite integration to make the call from. If not specified, LevelOps will only be able to reach public APIs.

content_type.description: Content type of the body (for example: "application/json")

11.name: Integrations API

filtering_mode.description: Select how the filters should be evaluated. This applies to all the filters at once.

output_mode.description: When returning a single row, only the first match will be returned. When iterating, the rest of the playbook is executed in a loop for each row that matched the filters.

config_table_filter.description: Specify one or more filters by selecting a column and what value it should contain. The behavior of the filters depends on the filtering mode below.
